___name.description: The name of the MariaDB service instance

___root_password.description: Specifies the password that will be set for the MariaDB root superuser account, required.

___mem.description: Memory to allocate to each MariaDB node.

___name.description: The name of a database to be created on image startup, optional.

___password.description: The password for a user to be created with superuser access to this database only., optional.

___username.description: The username of a user to be created with superuser access to this database only, optional.

___host_volume.description: The location of a volume on the host to be used for persisting MariaDB data. The final location will be derived from this value plus the name set in `name` (e.g. `/mnt/host_volume/mariadb`). Note that this path must be the same on all DCOS agents.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each MariaDB node.

___bridge.description: Whether to use bridge networking mode for Docker container. By default, this is false and host mode networking is used.
